title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. 

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Set a default value in the list box of the report parameter. 

OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. 

EB: Change the Display type to Combo Box. 

Expected result: "aaa" should be the default value. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out. 

Actual result: No default value is set. After step 5, the OK button can still be used.
SR:
1. Create a report parameter with a list box.
2. Set a default value for the list box.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Verify that the default value is lost and not retained.
5. Change the Display type to Combo Box.
6. Verify that the default value is set to "aaa".
7. Verify that after step 5, the OK button is grayed out.
